scripts.ios:build: cd mobile/ios && xcodebuild -workspace wihy.xcworkspace -scheme wihy -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 17 Pro' build
scripts.ios:run: cd mobile/ios && xcodebuild -workspace wihy.xcworkspace -scheme wihy -sdk iphonesimulator -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 17 Pro' && open -a Simulator && xcrun simctl install booted /Users/kortney/Desktop/wihy_app/mobile/ios/build/Build/Products/Debug-iphonesimulator/wihy.app
scripts.clean: cd mobile && rm -rf node_modules ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock && npm install && cd ios && pod install
